verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Odin loves the little Vikings All the Vikings of the world Whether drunk on ale or mead In a boat or on a steed Odin loves the little Vikings of the world.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Odin loves the little Vikings All the Vikings of the world If you're drunk and thrown in jail Odin - and your axe! - are bail Odin loves the little Vikings of the world.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Odin loves the little Vikings All the Vikings of the world Offer up an ox or two And he'll be in debt to you. Odin loves the little Vikings of the world.
